import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; function DataSubjectForm() { let publicPath = process.env.PUBLIC_URL; return ( <>

Data Subject Application Form :

You may transmit this form to us, Cuengine:
  • By sending it with your wet signature and copy of identity card to the address: Cumhuriyet Mah., Silahşör Cd., Bomonti Business Center, D:No:8/23-24, Şişli/İstanbul, or
  • By signing it with secure electronic signature or mobile signature and sending to e-mail address info@cuengine.com, or,
  • By signing it with secure electronic signature or mobile signature and sending to the address xys.@.ke p via registered electronic mail (KEP), or
  • By applying in person to Cuengine with a valid identity document.
Download Form
) } export default DataSubjectForm;
